title: Measurement value
description: The message that gets send by an AIS device. Values that are undefined should be set by the AIS device using the default

entity_id.description: The mmsi identifier (ais entity) this value is related to

ais_message_type.description: The message type of the given AIS measurement

repeat_indicator.description: The amount of times the message has been repeated (3 is do not repeat anymore)
